General.Name: Shenzhen Rayitek Hi-Tech Film Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Rayitek Hi-Tech Film Company Ltd., Shenzhen engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of PI films in China. It offers thermal control PI films, electronic PI films, electrical PI films, etc. the company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
